fr.ign.cogit.geoxygene.appli.render.texture

Class BinaryGradientTexture

  • Object
    • BasicTexture
      • BinaryGradientTexture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GLTexture

    public class BinaryGradientTexture
extends BasicTexture
    Author:
    JeT BinaryGradient texture returns the coordinates equal to the provided point. It contains a BinaryGradientImage and gives texture as a floating point texture to the GPU
